text: Vizzuality is a science and technology company focused on data visualization, web-GIS and tool development and committed to working on projects related to conservation, the environment and sustainable development. They have offices in Madrid, Cambridge and Porto.https://www.vizzuality.com/about/ Vizzuality is a member of the board of directors of Citizen Science Alliance that owned and operated the citizen science web portal Zooniverse. ==External links== * Vizzuality website * Citizen Science Alliance * Global Forest Watch ==References== Category:Science websites Category:Citizen science
title: Vizzuality
